TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlDataSourceEnumerator extends System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator
Public NotInheritable Class SqlDataSourceEnumerator Inherits DbDataSourceEnumerator

summary.span: 提供列舉區域網路內所有可用之 SQL Server 執行個體的機制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for enumerating all available instances of SQL Server within the local network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 2000 和 SQL Server 2005 可讓應用程式，以判斷目前的網路內的 SQL Server 執行個體存在。Both SQL Server 2000 and SQL Server 2005 make it possible for applications to determine the existence of SQL Server instances within the current network. 類別會公開給應用程式開發人員，提供此資訊包含所有可用的伺服器的相關資訊。The class exposes this information to the application developer, providing a containing information about all the available servers. 傳回此表列出符合清單，當使用者嘗試建立新的連接，提供的伺服器執行個體，並在`Connection Properties` 對話方塊中，展開下拉式清單包含所有可用的伺服器。This returned table contains a list of server instances that matches the list provided when a user attempts to create a new connection, and on the `Connection Properties` dialog box, expands the drop-down list containing all the available servers.

related.span: 列舉 SQL Server 執行個體

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetDataSources() cil managed

span.span: Retrieves a containing information about all visible SQL Server 2000 or SQL Server 2005 instances.

returns.span: 傳回 ，其中包含可見的 SQL Server 執行個體之相關資訊。

span.span: Returns a containing information about the visible SQL Server instances.

related.span: 列舉 SQL Server 執行個體
